3: Sister, we will take care of the rest of them.
Please escort the others to the crossroad up ahead. My team is stationed there and it should be safe.
Understood, I will safely lead everyone—
Oh right, if you see a soldier with his hair tied up, tell him that he's in charge of leading team Oasis now.
...I won't deliver these kinds of messages! If you have something to tell him, come back alive and tell him yourself!
Hah, you're a tough one, Sister.
(Ugh, they keep increasing in numbers... This is getting a bit out of hand...)
